name: Roboy And The Dastardly Deeds of the Coward Rob Robotson
name_original: Roboy And The Dastardly Deeds of the Coward Rob Robotson
description:
Roboy v0.1 - Current Build

REQUIRES AN ANALOG CONTROLLER (XBOX OR PS4/5 work the best) 

Only a title scrreen and and a test level at the moment.

Installation and run:

1. Right click the "Roboy.exe" file and select open.

2. If you recieve a warning from windows, select "more option" and then "run anyway"

*Some system settings may remove file extensions like .exe

Use "Alt+F4" to exit the game.

Thanks for playing! I hope you enjoy!

-Clint Wagoner
